name: github-selected-tab-color
title: GitHub Selected Tab Color
description: Add a custom selected tab color to GitHub

scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run stylelint
scripts.major: node tools/bump-version.js major && git add . && npm version -f major
scripts.minor: node tools/bump-version.js minor && git add . && npm version -f minor
scripts.patch: node tools/bump-version.js patch && git add . && npm version -f patch
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run stylelint
